thread.title: Tourism Australia inks marketing deal with Expedia
thread.title_full: Tourism Australia inks marketing deal with Expedia | Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Tourism Australia inks marketing deal with Expedia
text:
Tourism Australia inks marketing deal with Expedia Published on : Wednesday, July 22, 2015
Tourism Australia has signed its first marketing deal with a global online travel firm, a three year tie-up with Expedia.
As per the agreement the parties jointly collaborate and develop marketing campaigns and content, with the key inbound markets of the UK and US the initial focus.
With travellers increasingly turning to online travel agencies to book travel, Expedia will prove to be an ideal conversion partner for Tourism Australia.
“Partnerships are critical to Tourism Australia in terms of us increasing our customer reach, providing cut through for our destination messaging and ultimately, making it easier for consumer to plan, book and buy quality Australian tourism products,” said Tourism Australia managing director John O’Sullivan.
According to the deal, the two parties will also share reporting of consumer insights and data analytics.
Tags: expedia , Tourism Australia
